text: Rubrepeira is a genus of orb-weaver spiders containing the single species, Rubrepeira rubronigra. It was first described by Herbert Walter Levi in 1992, found from Mexico to Brazil. ==References== Category:Araneidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Central America Category:Spiders of Mexico Category:Spiders of South America
title: Rubrepeira
